DOC.brief_summary: Feeding intolerance is a common problem in preterm infants.
DOC.brief_title: Glycerin Suppositories for Treatment of Feeding Intolerance in Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Preterm infants with birth weight equal or less than 1500 g Significant congenital malformations Severity of illness such that death is likely in the first few days after birth
